TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InheritanceBehavior extends System.Enum

summary.span: Indicates the current mode of lookup for both property value inheritance, a resource lookup, and a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.

span.span: Indicates the current mode of lookup for both property value inheritance, a resource lookup, and a RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Una ricerca RelativeSource FindAncestor si verifica quando un'associazione utilizza una dotato relativi impostata sul valore.A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup occurs when a binding uses a that has its property set to the value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior Default = int32(0)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element and continue walking up the element tree to the page root.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element and continue walking up the element tree to the page root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse richiederà tramite l'elemento corrente e ulteriormente.A resource lookup will query through the current element and further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNext = int32(6)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse esegue una query sull'elemento corrente ma non oltre.A resource lookup will query the current element but not any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipAllNow = int32(5)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse non richiederà l'elemento corrente o any ulteriormente.A resource lookup will not query the current element or any further. Una ricerca RelativeSource FindAncestor non richiederà l'elemento corrente o any ulteriormente.A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNext = int32(2)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse eseguirà una query elemento corrente e quindi si passa ai dizionari dell'applicazione e il tema, piuttosto che scorrere l'albero degli elementi verso la radice della pagina.A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the application and theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToAppNow = int32(1)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse non richiederà l'elemento corrente, ma si passa per l'applicazione e quindi i dizionari tema, piuttosto che scorrere l'albero degli elementi verso la radice della pagina.A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the application and then the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root. Una ricerca RelativeSource FindAncestor non richiederà l'elemento corrente o any ulteriormente.A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNext = int32(4)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will query the current element but not any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse eseguirà una query elemento corrente e quindi si passa alla dizionari dei temi, piuttosto che scorrere l'albero degli elementi verso la radice della pagina o controllare i dizionari di applicazione.A resource lookup will query the current element and will then skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.InheritanceBehavior SkipToThemeNow = int32(3)

summary.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

span.span: Property value inheritance lookup will not query the current element or any further.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Ricerca di risorse non richiederà l'elemento corrente, ma si passa alla dizionari dei temi, piuttosto che scorrere l'albero degli elementi verso la radice della pagina o controllare i dizionari di applicazione.A resource lookup will not query the current element but will skip over to the theme dictionaries, rather than walking up the element tree toward the page root, or checking application dictionaries. Una ricerca RelativeSource FindAncestor non richiederà l'elemento corrente o any ulteriormente.A RelativeSource FindAncestor lookup will not query the current element or any further.
